SAIYA_Defend.NAME: Block
SAIYA_Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have !M! or more Ki gain an extra 2 Block.

EnergyBlast.NAME: Energy Blast
EnergyBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. If you have !M! or more Ki, consume it to deal an extra 2 damage to each enemy.

PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Yell REALLY loud in order to gain !M! Ki and !B! block.

KameHameHa.NAME: Kame Hame Ha
KameHameHa.DESCRIPTION: Use up to 20 Ki to deal up to !D! damage to an enemy, total damage is proportional to Ki used. NL Combo Finisher: Costs 1 less energy per Combo Chain counter.

KaioKen.NAME: KaioKen
KaioKen.DESCRIPTION: Gain 20 Ki, apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. NL Exhaust.

MeteorDash.NAME: Meteor Dash
MeteorDash.DESCRIPTION: Dash at the enemy to deliver a heavy blow dealing !D! damage. Start a Combo

BurningSoul.NAME: Burning Soul
BurningSoul.DESCRIPTION: Consume up to !M! Ki at the end of every turn in order to gain the same amount of Ki Barrier.

Flurry.NAME: Flurry
Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy 3 times. If you have !M! or more Ki, consume it to deal 1 more damage per hit. Increases Combo chain.

ThirstForFight.NAME: Thirst for Battle
ThirstForFight.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every buff on a target enemy. NL Exhaust.
ThirstForFight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every buff on a target enemy.

Teleport.NAME: Instant Transfer
Teleport.DESCRIPTION: Teleport next to the enemy to Start a Combo or increase your current Combo Chain. Consumes !M! Ki.

DrainingStrike.NAME: Draining Strike
DrainingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain [E]  for each enemy hit with unblocked damage.
DrainingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain [E]  for each enemy hit.

Taunt.NAME: Taunt
Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Give an enemy !M! Strength, gain 1 Reflect.

KiExplosion.NAME: Ki Explosion
KiExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and !M! Ki Barrier. Consumes 10 Ki.

SolarFlare.NAME: Solar Flare
SolarFlare.DESCRIPTION: Stun an enemy for 1 turn. Consumes !M! Ki.
SolarFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun All enemies for 1 turn. Consumes !M! Ki.

SenzuBean.NAME: Senzu Bean
SenzuBean.DESCRIPTION: Give a non-minion enemy a Second Chance. When it dies it is revived with !M! bonus Strength and can only take a third of its max HP of damage per turn
SenzuBean.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give a non-minion enemy a Second Chance. When it dies it is revived with !M! bonus Strength and Metallicize.

GenkiDama.NAME: Genki Dama
GenkiDama.DESCRIPTION: Consume all your Ki (up to !M!) and deal that much damage to all enemies. Gain 2 Weakened.
